function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Underfunding of global surveillance of viruses capable of transmission to humans","Impact":"Incomplete surveillance increases the risk of undetected outbreaks and delayed responses to emerging infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Increase funding for global surveillance programs and research on viral evolution","Technologies":"Advanced surveillance and diagnostic technologies, genomic sequencing","People":"Global population, especially those in areas with high wildlife interaction","Owner":"Government agencies, international health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Human settlement and activity increase human-wildlife interfaces and facilitate interspecific pathogen transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic disease transmission from wildlife to humans","Mitigation":"Implement land use policies that prioritize environmental health and reduce human-wildlife interfaces","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, land use planning tools, remote sensing","People":"Urban planners, policymakers, wildlife conservation organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, urban planning authorities, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Infrastructure inequities enhance host susceptibility and can facilitate disease transmission","Impact":"Higher vulnerability to contagious diseases in populations with inadequate infrastructure","Mitigation":"Invest in improving infrastructure equity and access to healthcare, sanitation, and clean water","Technologies":"Smart infrastructure, remote monitoring, data analytics for resource allocation","People":"Communities with inadequate infrastructure, marginalized populations","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, community advocacy groups"}]}
